trans-unit.source: Advice From a Friend (1 Intellect point) #Ability #SupportAbility #Low #Core
trans-unit.target: Advice From a Friend (1 Intellect point) #Ability #SupportAbility #Low #Core

trans-unit.source: You know your friend’s strengths and weaknesses, and how to motivate them to succeed. When you give an ally a suggestion involving their next action, the character is trained in that action for one round.
trans-unit.target: You know your friend’s strengths and weaknesses, and how to motivate them to succeed. When you give an ally a suggestion involving their next action, the character is trained in that action for one round.
